summary: This bill, the "Streamlining Procurement for Effective Execution and Delivery Act of 2025" or "SPEED Act," aims to reform the Department of Defense's acquisition processes. It focuses on aligning acquisition with warfighter priorities, accelerating the requirements process, balancing regulation with efficiency, strengthening the defense industrial base, and developing a mission-oriented acquisition workforce. Key provisions include reorganizing program management around capability areas, adjusting acquisition thresholds, and promoting modular open system approaches.
